title: Cabbage root fly
creator_credit: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the life cycle of this insect which has become a serious pest in Europe and America, the larvae attacking cruciferous plants such as the cabbage and cauliflower.
creator_credit_for_label: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
